name: TKH Group
overview: TKH Group N.V. provides telecom, building, and industrial solutions based on system concepts, products, and related services in Europe, the United States, and Asia. Its Telecom Solutions segment develops, produces, and supplies outdoor infrastructure for telecom and CATV networks, and indoor home networking applications. This segment offers indoor telecom systems, such as home networking, broadband connectivity, power plug systems, and IPTV-solutions; fiber network systems; and copper network systems. The Telecom Solutions segment serves telecom and cable operators, service providers, telecom installers, telecom retailers, and housing association markets. The companyâ€™s Building Solutions segment provides solutions in the field of electro-technology for the care and security sectors. This segmentâ€™s product line includes building technologies comprising structured plug and play cable systems, light and light switch systems, video communication, and information systems; security systems, such as systems for CCTV, video/audio-analysis and detection, intercom, access control, central control rooms, and retail security; and connectivity systems, such as specialty cable systems for shipbuilding, railways, infrastructure, and energy markets. The Building Solutions segment serves utility, government, traffic infrastructure, care institutions, parking organization, marine and offshore, energy companies, and rail markets.

acquisitions.source_description: TKH Group N.V. to Acquire Optelecom-NKF, Inc.
